players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment."
You: "I believe in collective reasoning and trust that we can work together to identify the mafia among us. Let's focus on gathering information during this discussion round."
Diana: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Alice, we must vote together to win."

You: "I have no concrete evidence at the moment, but based on our conversation yesterday, I find it suspicious that Diana was so sure of her investigation results without providing any substantial proof. We should remain cautious and gather more information before making any decisions."

Bob: "I'm glad that we're all working together to gather more information. I still don't have any concrete evidence, but based on the events of last night and today, it seems suspicious that Diana was so quick to accuse me without providing any substantial proof..."

Diana was arrested
